subject: RE: [junit] Adding Junit to Eclispe

Hi, Ben
 
It appeared to, it had java plug in options, but when I uninstal=
led the javascript and installed the java version, I was able to see the Ju=
nit Test Case option.  
I appreciate the help, thanks.
